place_description: Specialty coffee shop, Desert, Pastries, Tea

reviews_data.review_text: We live in the neighborhood and the staff is very friendly. Ordered an iced coffee cream no sugar and it was so smooth and they offered a pup cup for my dog. Love this place

This place is nearby so occasionally I'll go there to work if things aren't good. I've had the coffee hear a few times and it's alright. At home I make Vietnamese coffee (robusta in a thin + condensed milk). There was construction noise and I was craving some VN coffee...perhaps it's been altered substantially to suit an american palette, but to me, it didn't taste any different aha a regular iced coffee. It was sort of bland, IMO. It would be nice to have seen something like coconut coffee, too. My review is tainted by a recent trip to Viet Nam...but yeah. If I'm paying for coffee I expect it to be as good or better than I can make at home. On the plus side they have an absolutely exquisite selection of loose leaf teas, nice ambience, and great staff. Overall still worth patronizing :)
always enjoy coming here and to the other locations!
Very nice staff, really cute cafe vibes. The vanilla lavender latte I got was amazing, as well as my bacon egg and cheese on a bagel sandwich. I highly recommend their special sauce as well.

As I sit here now, drinking my latte, I see a live bug crawling on the wall, hairs and crumbs on the countertop, and filthy baseboards and floors. Makes me not want to drink my latte because if the guest side of the bar is dirty, the employee side must be dirty too.
Lovely, clean location with abundant parking available. Only tried oat milk latte but they had hood muffins/sweets selection, including some vegan items
Amazing Coffee and food! Very nice and attentive workers.
Best coffee in Charlotte
I have a good time here with my hubby and daughter, celebrate a goals Ty god
Gluten free cookie, great macaroons, cute environment, and free WiFi

I'm used to drinking a plain dark roast drip coffee or a cold brew. So, I was interested in trying something new. Was recommend this Vietnamese style drink with condensed milk and it's delicious. It's well balanced and cost wasn't too bad.

The service was great and the aesthetic of the shop is top tier. I would definitely return to this location in the future.
Great drinks and very dog friendly! Great snacks as well.
my friend and i stopped by on a tuesday afternoon and soomin was great! our drinks are so yummy! :)

Soomin was cool as hell and personable! She made our drinks quickly and talked to us. Definitely coming back because of her! She recommended a drink to me I normally don't get and it was tasty! Thanks Soomin:)

Terrible, I waited forever before the server finally came out of the back room. My coffee was very bitter, which I acknowledge may be personal, however the brownie was stale and almost inedible. Wouldn't recommend!
Yummy coffee and muffins, super cute spot!

Highly overrated. This place needs better tasting drinks. I had a rose latte and it was inedible - tasted like I was drinking perfume! Had to send it back and replaced with chai which was also nasty. Staff was very friendly. Sorry, this place needs to do better.
While the staff is soooooo nice... the coffee is not as nice. Coffee tastes bitter and syrups taste like medicine.
Excellent coffee and kind staff!

Went there for the first time today. I wasn't greeted as I walked in either. The coffee was very bitter and I ended up throwing it away.  Definitely will not be going back. Only went because of the ratings I seen online.
No greeting when walked in, coffee was overly bitter. Wasn't a good experience at all. Won't return
The coffee is great but the service needs work. One of the cashiers is pretty rude.

This place is on my morning commute to work and lately everytime I come in to place an order it seems to be an inconvenience to the staff. Last week my order was missing ingredients, this week my breakfast sandwich was over-salted deliberately there's no way that was an accident when you bite into a heap of salt .. I could not eat it and had to toss it out. Really disappointed with this waterbean location I would like to be a customer and continue giving them business but I just cannot with the way they have been doing things unfortunately I will not be going back. Wish the owners would do a better job vetting who they hire

Got a mocha latte. It was terrible. Found this at the bottom. Bagel was comparable to a chewy crouton. Reached out to company directly to let them know, but they wouldn't respond. Just way too expensive for the poor quality.
Did not purchase food. But their coffee is top of the top. LOVE this place.
Loved the coffee and having so many cool options.
Cute spot and friendly baristas. They're also dog friendly and will give your furry friend a pup cup
Very nice and cozy coffee spot. Chase knows his beans.
You have got to try a cold foam coffee here, dine-in!
Great vibes, best coffee, service exceeded my expectations
Service is average, but my latte is always delicious (although expensive)
Great drink options and good coffee

Lot's of roasted coffee beans to choose from .
A unique tasting espresso!!
Nice place to sit in or outside....
I love love love this coffee. Yall always have the cutest staff! This is my fav coffee place!
So deliciously hip and intimate. Vietnamese coffee is my new favorite thing.
The BEST cold brew / iced coffee. Great work location with lots of natural light. Friendly staff. Yummy snacks.
Good quality coffee. Staff is always friendly and happy to answer questions
Great coffee
Best coffee shop in Charlotte, no matter which one you go to. Baristas are very nice! The entire shop was clean & well lit!
I love Waterbean! The chai is always a favorite.

I don't know what has gone wrong with this place , it used to be good but now completely sucks. The coffee and the treatment of customers is equally bad. There was a time I loved going here but today ( Sunday to be precise ) was worst had to wait for 45 mins to get 2 coffees , others doing the same people waiting ... and guess what it is not a $1 coffee it's expensive .... And when you get really bad bad coffee you can't really do much than  hope Waterbean takes notice of their outlets and try to fix it. It would be great if they choose not losing customers... I'm at least done with this location.
Great service and coffee tastes very good. I ordered caramel Latte and it was not overwhelmingly sweet. Small place but very cute and plenty of tables to enjoy inside.
Expensive
Probably one of the best coffee stores out there. Plus I love it because they make Vietnamese Coffee.
So impressed that they gave their proceeds for Christmas Eve to a fallen CMPD officer. The creme brulee iced coffee was the bomb!

Waterbean is a clean & quiet place to get some work done on your laptop, with great, reasonably priced coffee and baked snacks.
It's located in an intimate space with a minimalist feel and modern ambient music. In the late afternoon,  be sure to dress in layers as the temperature fluctuates when the sun peeks through the huge windows.
It's easy to access the free Wi-Fi which is fast enough for most any task you might have.
Thanks to Crystal who is a friendly and accommodating barista!
For a coffee shop they don't have outlets to plug into. It's like they really are saying.... not staying here long. Come on....your a coffee shop
Excellent latte thanks for having vegan gluten free options

Ill keep coming back here! The coffee has been consistently great every time, the service has been impeccable and welcoming,  the macarons have never disappointed either. Be warned if you are purchasing beans here though, their espresso blend is very light-roast, which if you have a home machine and don't take it with milk, may be a little too far on the acidic side.

Waterbean is a great spot for a hot cappuccino, which is just what I was going there for, and the coffee is served hot, just like it should be. The staff  is incredibly friendly, and the breakfast sandwiches I've eaten there were tasty. I'll be back!
Amazing coffee, great sandwiches

Great coffee, I've had it multiple times. I wish I wasn't treated differently than their main customer base. It's as if the staff is afraid of me every time I visit. Will probably not return to this location.

Interesting building layout. I enjoyed walking in and grazing up at the high ceiling, until I saw pic related.
Further, being suggested to not get certain orders, because "there are a lot of people ahead of you" isn't exactly a good sign. We took their advice and ordered iced coffee (apparently "famous") but it still took over 15 minutes to be made. Not worth the wait.
Finally, they sell macarons. The options are $2.35 individually, or, "to save a few bucks," a box of 5 for $12.50. I'll let you use your phone calculator to figure out the savings.
TL;DR Starbucks is 300 meters up the street.
EDIT: Spoke to my wife, the wait was 20-25 minutes, not 15. My bad.
Great customer service. Great coffee..just loved the ambience.
Over extracted machiato.

I spoke with Tony the Owner after I had a different experience at this location but his follow up with me was absolutely wonderful I actually enjoyed talking to him and he listened to my issue and let me know he would follow up to make sure it doesn't happen again I will definitely go back and give this place several more visits after speaking with him.
Very good coffee that is not over roasted!  Excellent food and good internet connection. I also liked the soothing but high energy background music.

I asked for a medium cappuccino, and was told they only make small cappuccinos...and they mean SMALL. It was an 8 oz cup. And why? The size is affected by the amount of milk, not espresso shots. If I want a 12 or 16 oz capp, why would you not provide that?  The staff was unfriendly as well.  First and last visit for me.
Multiple espresso options. Quick service. This is a great spot!!
Famous iced coffee didnt taste so famous until I added more sugar to it, then it was the bomb. Its a little pricey, but it was good.
The best one to go to in town.
Decent neighborhood coffee shop but nothing special.
Nice friendly people, great coffee.
Vietnamese coffee is the best
Good espresso drinks

Great place to study as a student, and good coffee. My only suggestion would be for the owners to install a shade on the windows that can be pulled down during sunny afternoons. There is TONS of natural light that comes in, but on a bright day it can be hard to work with a glare in your face. Other than that, great.
Coffee was delicious! Maybe just add some umbrellas outside.
Great Latte, Great Customer Service and clean bathroom! Excellent place to sit outside and work!
Loved the coffee. Their agreement with the Novel makes the coffee affordable
I bought a 16 oz iced coffee. It was $4, so for me it's a bit expensive for a black coffee. I'll probably go back and try their pastries if I'm in the area.
The coffee is so good it ended my 4 yr addiction with Starbucks. #movingon #Byefelicia

I experienced a very rude and inconsiderate barista while there with my wife.  To be fair ... the coffee, food, location, and ambience are all nice.  Despite that though, we won't be back again any time soon based on that experience.  I'd rather go somewhere where you're treated with decency and respect ... especially these days.

I love a good aesthetically pleasing cafe!

Cute, clean location. Ordered the Volcano  & it was a bit sweet but strong! Would recommend if you're in the mood for a mix of dark roast & condensed milk.

SN: There is seating available on the outside & inside. Parking is available in the parking garage next to it.
LOVE the s'mores latte! Such a cute place and really good coffee. So glad that Falon, Brandon, and Michelle from Novel told me about this place. Plus they have amazing teas for sale.
I usually stop by here when walking my dog -- love the coffee and great customer service.  Wish they had more varieties of coffee and opened early in the morning.
Great lattes! Their plain iced coffee is very bitter!
I live right across the street and love coming by for coffee! their Ice Coffee is not something to mess with- Its my fave and gets me going on sluggish days!
Very nice coffee shop. Clean. Love the Vietnamese coffee.

Visited this cafe on a recent trip to Charlotte. Ordered a iced caramel latte. It was one of the best I have ever tasted! Awesome atmosphere too! I will definitely visit again the next time I am in the area.

Stopped by here the other day to check it out. This is one of my new favorite spots. The espresso options are super unique and this is a REAL coffee shop. Not to mention, the number of teas are amazing. Cool atmosphere and friendly staff. Definitely will return.
Best coffee on Park Rd! Multiple espresso and brew bar options... Tasty pastries and croissants. Fascinating service and baristas. I hear they will be getting beer and wine at some point!
